comment._content: There's a Fred Jacob Kafer, 1909-1990, buried at Eagle's Point Cemetery in Oregon, a WWII veteran; but I think he was also born in Oregon. Anyway, just in case: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSvcid=1884...;
